features: Wilderness With Lavender smells like wild lavender, which is much rowdier than ordinary lavender
The Fresher Collection has real freshness forged with real ingredients
Tell your underarm odor to take a hike! And then take a hike in the opposite direction from your underarm odor
Once you smell like nature, you’ll forget about all of your problems and your life will be better and you’ll finally get that promotion you know you deserve
Old Spice Invisible Solid Men's Anti-perspirant and Deodorant reduces armpit sweat, goes on invisible, and stays feeling dry
body.description: Freshness can be an elusive thing. Sometimes it takes real grit to find the freshest freshness. That's why we dispatched a SEAL team to collect it. Only later did we realize that they were a team of actual seals and far better divers than mountain climbers. At any rate, they made it work and we all learned something in the process. Wilderness With Lavender smells like a hike through the rugged backcountry in spring. That's about as manly as flower-tromping gets. Old Spice Men's Invisible Solid Antiperspirant and Deodorant reduces armpit sweat, goes on invisible, and stays feeling dry. So bring the scent of your adventures home or smell like the adventures you haven't ventured yet. We won't judge. Just do you, guy.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My gf loves it
reviews.reviewText: I ordered for my girlfriend and she loves it. They sent me a new one when the first didn't arrive. It didn't come broken.

reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite deodorant now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell and the gel formula. Only complaint is it’s not an antiperspirant so you still end up smelling. It’s for my husband who works outside and sweats a lot. Old Spice usually works but I should have paid closer attention. I try to make sure we allHave and antiperspirant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best antiperspirant for sweaty (wo)men
reviews.reviewText: I'm a sweaty bit....gal. Secret "Strong enough for a man" is not strong enough for these sweat glands even at rest. I decided to try out this deodorant because I figured lavender would be a decent scent. It isn't super feminine, but it's not a harsh, masculine scent -- very unisex. It isn't an invisible solid, though I've never really experienced a product that lived up to those claims -- just carry around a piece of nylon and rub onto the marks to remove -- you can thank me later. I don't feel like I need to reapply this throughout the day. Very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works great as it always has as antiperspirant . Scent maybe not the best.
reviews.reviewText: Works well like All Spice always does. "Lavender" scent smells like air freshener so you kind of smell like a bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The WORST $10 spent on Amazon in a while!!!
reviews.reviewText: So after discovering this scent last year, my GF and I really liked it ... that is until we couldn't find it anymore. On a whim I looked for it a few weeks back on Amazon. Low and behold, found it! (Big surprise right? Lol. Amazon has almost EVERYTHING!!) WELL FIRST OFF, $10 for pit stick is waay too steep in the first place. Secondly Anti-persprant give mevan allergic reaction and makes the skin in my armpits peel, so I only and always buy just the deodorant. Well the day came (seems like everyday) my package came.... and the sent the anti perspiration type... the type im allergic to. I dont write reviews often but I just felt this was total BS!! I mean Amazon is NOT a fast food joint in the sense that they get orders wrong. In my case Amazon has like a 99.99% success rate as far as sending the proper item. Im not bashing the 'zon ... im bashing old spice. In my mind they ripped me off!!! Charged too much and sent the wrong item ... probably because they didn't have the right type on hand. I wouldve been fine waiting. Not to mention sending back the wrong thing that cost only $10 was a waste of time. Its just frustratingRant over
